import axios from"axios";export default{getBook:function getBook(query){return axios.get("https://www.googleapis.com/books/v1/volumes?q=".concat(query));},// Deletes book with given id
deleteBook:function deleteBook(id){return axios.delete("/api/books/"+id).then(function(result){return result.data;});},// Saves a book to database
saveBook:function saveBook(bookData){return axios.post("http://localhost:3000/api/books",bookData).then(function(result){return result.data;});},// Get saved books from database
savedBooks:function savedBooks(){return axios.get("/api/books").then(function(result){return result.data;});}};
